subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Sébastien Bourdais won the pole for the Steelback Grand Prix of Toronto by edging Justin Wilson with fewer than 10 seconds left in the final qualifying session yesterday. Bourdais and Wilson battled throughout the 30-minute session, trading the top spot several times before Bourdais turned a lap of 58.288 seconds to barely beat Wilson’s 58.299.
